org.drip.analytics.output

Class BondCouponMeasures

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.output.BondCouponMeasures

  • public class BondCouponMeasures
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the parsimonius but complete set of the cash-flow oriented coupon measures generated out of a full bond analytics run to a given work-out. These are: - DV01 - PV Measures (Coupon PV, Index Coupon PV, PV)
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy

        Parameters:
